title: Bug 18705 - Too much flashing in Control Example
description: When resizing the window in the vertical direction in the Control Example, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash. This behavior is not expected.
OB: When resizing the window in the vertical direction in the Control Example, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: Only the bottom edge of the outermost frames should be repainted when resizing the window in the vertical direction.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Control Example.
2. Resize the window in the vertical direction only.
3. Notice that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
